data.title: Connecting card game designers and players
data.meta_description: Print your card games and create your own cards for popular card games.
data.text:
Title Publisher Price

Atonement - Custom Card

+1 stealth action. Requires a vampire with capacity 5 or less. Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets +1 intercept and does not lock for blocking a vampire the same age or younger. Any vampire can burn this card as a [iZ]action; Ministers get -1 stealth during that action. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Baldrick - Custom Card

Sabbat: Baldrick may recruit Tunnel Runner as if he met the requirements of playing that card. When a Tunnel Runner you control successfully bleeds a Methuselah that Methuselah burns the top card of his or her library as well. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Caitlin, The Rebel - Custom Card

Anarch: Combat cards cost her 1 fewer blood. [i4] If Caitlin successfully inflicted more damage than the opposing minion at the end of combat, move 1 blood from the blood bank to a younger vampire in your uncontrolled region. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Chill Of The Windsaber - Custom Card

Not usable during the first round of combat. Only usable at long range. [iQ] Strike: 3R damage. [is][iQ] As above, but with first strike. [im] Strike: 4R damage, if the opposing minion is not ready after combat, he or she is burned. [lW][im] As above, but the striking minion pay ... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Derange - Custom Card

This is a +1 stealth action. [iZ]Put this card on a younger vampire. The vampire with this card is considered to be the same clan as the acting vampire. The vampire with this card does not unlock as normal. During their controller's unlock phase, they may burn 1 blood to unlock. The vampire with this card may move it to another vampire as a [iZ]action. This card cannot be placed... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Dmitri's Wonderland - Custom Card

[is]+ 1 intercept. [lW][l1]As above, but the acting minion must burn one blood or the action gets -1 stealth. [is][iw][iE]Give any minion + 1 or -1 intercept. [lW][l1][ia]Give any minion + 1 or -1 intercept, and the action minion may burn one blood to get +1 stealth. The blocking minion may burn one blood get +1 intercept. "Take a left turn at the mushroom and you will arrive at the Eiffel Tower."... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

François Villon - Custom Card

Camarilla: Once each turn François can untap after performing a successful action. [i4]Toreador Justicar: Any vampire attempting to block François burns an additional blood. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Harald, The Underking Of Paris - Custom Card

Independent. 2 votes (titled): While Harald is ready, all other minions you control gain +1 level of Obfuscate [iE]. +1 strength. +1 stealth. +1 hand size. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Harmony - Custom Card

+1 stealth action.

Ⓓ Your prey burns 3 pool for each Choir card you control. Burn all Choir cards... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

International Backlash - Custom Card

Excavation. Call a referendum. If this referendum passes, put this card on the acting minion. When the Methuselah controlling this minion gains an artifact from the excavation deck place this card and the artifact on the bottom of the excavation deck (shuffle afterward). If this referendum fails place this card on the bottom of the excavation deck (shuffle... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Jake Washington (hunter) - Custom Card

Unique master. Put this card in play, while in play, this card represents a mortal ally with I live, 0 strength and 0 bleed and doesn't count as a master card. During your untap phase, you may burn Jake to move up to 4 blood from the blood blank to a ready vampire with no blood. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Kassandra - Custom Card

Independent. 2 votes (titled): Kassandra can take a +1 stealth action to draw 4 cards from your library, afterward select 4 cards from your hand to put them on the bottom of your library. Scarce. +1 intercept. +1 hand size. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Katharina Nimoff - Custom Card

Anarch: Katharina can recruit a werewolf ally as if she met the requirements of playing that card. While she is ready, werewolfs cost you 1 fewer pool. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Katharina Nimoff - Custom Card

Camarilla primogen: Katharina can recruit a werewolf ally as if she met the requirements of playing that card. While she is ready, werewolfs cost you 1 fewer pool. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Mark Rothschild - Custom Card

Camarilla Primogen: Mark can move any investment card from your ash heap to your library as a +1 stealth action. Shuffle your library afterward. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Mark Rothschild - Custom Card

Camarilla Primogen: Mark can move any investment card from your ash heap to your library as a +1 stealth action. Shuffle your library afterward. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Not To Be - Custom Card

Master: out-of-turn. Cancel an event card as it is played (no cost is paid). Put this card in play. During your master phase, you get one additional master phase action. During your discard phase, you get one fewer discard phase action, and this card is burned. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Nsa Trio - Custom Card

Government. During the first combat between an acting vampire and a blocking vampire each turn, neither combatant may end combat as a strike in the firs round. A Methuselah may use a discard phase action to burn this card if his or her minions attempted no actions in the current turn. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Pact With Werewolves - Custom Card

Unique master. Trifle. Put 3 pact counters on this card. An Ahrimane you control can use these counters to pay some or all of the blood or pool cost of a werewolf he or she recruit. Burn this card if it has no counters. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.55

Pact With Werewolves - Custom Card

Unique master. Trifle. Put this card in play with 3 counters. An Ahrimane [lb] you control can use these counters to pay some or all of the blood or pool cost of a werewolf he or she recruits. Burn this card if it has no counters. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Quartermaster - Custom Card

Only usable as the action is announced. This minion equips with a non-unique, non-weapon equipment card from your hand (requirements and cost apply as normal). The equipment cannot cost 2 or more pool or blood. "What have you done. When you signed for the car's user permission yesterday it was for a car with 5 doors...now it has no doors anymore. And are those bullet holes... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Silvia, - Custom Card

Princess of Zola Predosa Once each turn she can discard a card requiring Melpominee [iA] to untap. She inflicts +1 damage with any Strike Card A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.55

Target Vitals - Custom Card

Aim. Play when choosing s strike. If any damage from strike is successfully inflicted on the opposing minion, he or she takes an additional 2 damage from this strike, and he or she cannot press this round. The opposing minion may discard two combat cards [iY] to cancel this card. A minion may play only one aim each strike. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

The First Horseman, Pestilence - Custom Card

Independent: During your master phase, you can search your library for a card named Vampiric Disease and put it on any vampire (shuffle afterward). When in combat with The First Horseman the opposing minion and each retainer on them take 1R environmental damage each round during strike resolution. Red List. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

The Second Horseman, War - Custom Card

Independent: During any Methuselah's untap phase, that Methuselah must choose a ready vampire controlled by their predator and another controlled by their prey. The chosen vampires enter combat. If only one is ready at the end of that combat, he or she gains 2 blood. Red List. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Traveling Far And Wide - Custom Card

+1 stealth action. After successfully resolving this action, remove this vampire and any cards and counters on them from the game (breaking any temporary control effects) and put this card in play with 2 travel counters on it. During your untap phase, burn 1 travel counter. When this card has no travel counters burn this card to return the vampire to play... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

Valkyrie "birdie" - Custom Card

Independent: Valkyrie cannot perform directed actions unless Brunhilde is ready. Non-Unique. +1 Strength. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.56

••• Cloak Of Night - Custom Card

Your other uses of [iE]Obfuscate are enhanced: ¤Your [iE]•• Touch of Shadow can now target humans and the like. ¤Spend a vitae to vanish entirely when activating [iE]• Face in the Crowd. You move unseen, unsmelt, and unheard. You can, however, leave incidential signs if you are e.g. moving through smoke. ¤If you attack someone while Obfuscated, add your [iE]dots... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

"brother" Zee Blues - Custom Card

Independent. Blues Brothers Circle. Cannot perform [iZ] actions while he is the oldest member of his Circle that is ready. +1 Strength. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

"donny" Donowitz - Custom Card

Sabbat Pack Priest of "The Sword of the South" "The Elders were already deep in hiding, for they had learned caution." A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.55

"harlequin" - Custom Card

Camarilla Primogen "Something stirs in the Warrens. And it is not the Hidden Clan." A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.55

"hobo" - Custom Card

Independent. When Hobo enters play, you may remove him from the game to seach your library for Scarce vampire or reduce Scarce penalty by 2 pool. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire ... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $1.05

"joliet" Jake Blues - Custom Card

Independent. Blues Brothers Circle. 1 Vote (nontitled). +1 Intercept when Elwood J. Blues is ready. Jake may Strike: Dodge once per combat. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

"nines" Rodriguez - Custom Card

Anarch Baron of Los Angeles: Referendums called by Nines gain +1 vote for each younger [lg] vampire you control. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.50

"the Father" - Custom Card

Independent: Cards requiring Daimoinon [iv] cost "The Father" 1 fewer blood. Infernal. + 1 intercept. + 1 stealth. A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.55

"tricksy" Carth - Custom Card

Camarilla "I am just a soldier. Oh well, I lied. I command these soldiers here." A community created card built with the DriveThruCards card creator. www.drivethrucards.com/builder/vampire... [click here for more] Black Chantry Productions $0.55
